channel.title: ZioBotic Pkz v2.2 | Amazing Dungeoneering
channel.description:
Hi I'm ziobotic
[Introduction] I Have mainly updated dungeoneering since [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509843.0]v.2[/url] ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509843.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509843.0[/url]) It Has a few of the same features so you might want to check that out later on. The Standards of the dungeoneering are brilliant, and i have not just kept the dungeons with three complexities i have added a dameonheim, point shop which you can add to more objects, docks to go to dungeoneering like on runescape at alkarid - thinking about adding custom interfaces...
[Extra Information] Custom plug-ins What is a plugin? Well a plugin is a peice of a program which upgrades or adds to another program (informal description), A plug-in (or plugin) is a set of software components that adds specific abilities to a larger software application. If supported, plug-ins enable customizing the functionality of an application (formal description)
[Features] Clipped Following Ring Of Kinship Teleports To DaemonHeim Player Clipping Slight Npc Clipping Dungeoneering With 3 Complexities New Emote Sprites DaemonHeim Dungeoneering Points System Empty shops for you to add ontop of 634 Items 508 Map Data exact dialogue (non quoted cba) Custom Korasi's Sword A Few Commands Fixing Bugs + Much More
[Features Maybe Being Added] Custom interfaces Fixing A Few More Mapdata Buggs +Not Much More
[Media] Media For The Haters In No Specific Order
[img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/training.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/TheDocks.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/Noshopsindung.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/magenpcsattackwithmage.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/Forcedchatanddungeoneeringteleport.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/dungeoneeringPointssystem.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/DungeoneeringPointsShop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/Dialogue.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/DaemonheimDialogue.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/Daemonheim.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/CustomKorasisspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1111.photobucket.com/albums/h469/Ziobotic/AddedShopsForYou.jpg[/img]
[More Information] If Your Intrested You can read some more of this information I've Given: My standards for this rsps were very high, so I asked my friend to install his networking and plugins a while back but he flipped on me when installing an update and crashed it, bugged everything and it wouldn't run so i've remade the v2.2 and i hope you like it
[For the people who didnt read the extra info] I hope you like it, download it and enjoy coding/playing/leaching it, if you leach it give credits or I will be annoyed (:
[Help Im Giving] Bestway to Update, when you have coded your "codes" :) keep the source running, compile your work, and then run wait till' the text comes on and you can close the old window, by doing that you lag out for about 1 - 3 seconds ( depending on your cpu and pc speed) without even clicking a button it will reload it for you, your players and there you have it - youve compiled Need help? Inbox me/Pm me for it and i will be there
[Must Read] I do NOT want this reposting and saying that you reposted for me, as you did not it was just a meaningless attemt of getting reputation And ip directory is set to local host so if you say its advertising do one, as it is not...
Download link is in a package : Download Is Here [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qbs4l4pxy0l8ex3]http://www.mediafire.com/?qbs4l4pxy0l8ex3[/url] I Spent a while on this, so post what you think
[Credits] Tom - Cache Based Kev - Ideass Kaex - Base Me - Coding

item.title: ZioBotic Pkz v2.2 | Amazing Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

Hi I’m ziobotic

[Introduction]
I Have mainly updated dungeoneering since v.2 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509843.0) It Has a few of the same features so you might want to check that out later on. The Standards of the dungeoneering are brilliant, and i have not just kept the dungeons with three complexities i have added a dameonheim, point shop which you can add to more objects, docks to go to dungeoneering like on runescape at alkarid - thinking about adding custom interfaces…

[Extra Information]
Custom plug-ins
What is a plugin?
Well a plugin is a peice of a program which upgrades or adds to another program (informal description), A plug-in (or plugin) is a set of software components that adds specific abilities to a larger software application. If supported, plug-ins enable customizing the functionality of an application (formal description)

[Features]
Clipped Following
Ring Of Kinship Teleports To DaemonHeim
Player Clipping
Slight Npc Clipping
Dungeoneering With 3 Complexities
New Emote Sprites
DaemonHeim
Dungeoneering Points System
Empty shops for you to add ontop of
634 Items
508 Map Data
exact dialogue (non quoted cba)
Custom Korasi’s Sword
A Few Commands
Fixing Bugs

  • Much More

[Features Maybe Being Added]
Custom interfaces
Fixing A Few More Mapdata Buggs
+Not Much More

[Media]
Media For The Haters In No Specific Order

training.jpg775×533

TheDocks.jpg775×533

Noshopsindung.jpg775×533

magenpcsattackwithmage.jpg775×533

Forcedchatanddungeoneeringteleport.jpg775×533

dungeoneeringPointssystem.jpg775×533

DaemonheimDialogue.jpg775×533

Daemonheim.jpg775×533

CustomKorasisspec.jpg775×533

AddedShopsForYou.jpg775×533

[More Information]
If Your Intrested You can read some more of this information I’ve Given: My standards for this rsps were very high, so I asked my friend to install his networking and plugins a while back but he flipped on me when installing an update and crashed it, bugged everything and it wouldn’t run so i’ve remade the v2.2 and i hope you like it

[For the people who didnt read the extra info]
I hope you like it, download it and enjoy coding/playing/leaching it, if you leach it give credits or I will be annoyed (:

[Help Im Giving]
Bestway to Update, when you have coded your “codes” keep the source running, compile your work, and then run wait till’ the text comes on and you can close the old window, by doing that you lag out for about 1 - 3 seconds ( depending on your cpu and pc speed) without even clicking a button it will reload it for you, your players and there you have it - youve compiled
Need help? Inbox me/Pm me for it and i will be there

[Must Read]
I do NOT want this reposting and saying that you reposted for me, as you did not it was just a meaningless attemt of getting reputation And ip directory is set to local host so if you say its advertising do one, as it is not…

Download link is in a package :
Download Is Here http://www.mediafire.com/?qbs4l4pxy0l8ex3
I Spent a while on this, so post what you think
